description: Engineered the initial meetings management platform that would later become Agendalo.io, focusing on full-stack development and infrastructure.
achievements: Engineered a meetings management platform using Vue.js for the frontend and Express.js for the backend
Managed AWS infrastructure, including EC2, Amplify, S3, and SES, to ensure high availability and performance
Integrated various third-party APIs such as Mercadopago, Niubiz, and Zoom, enhancing the platform's functionality
Created CI/CD pipelines using Docker and Gitlab Pipelines, reducing deployment times and improving development workflow
